s17cs350task1.Box

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Box Box.clone()
      Returns a deep clone of this box.
      Box Connector.getChildBox()
      Gets the child box to attach this connector to.
      Box Connector.getParentBox()
      Gets the parent box that this connector is attached to, if it is attached (check with Connector.hasParentBox()).
      Methods in s17cs350task1 that return types with arguments of type Box 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Gets all the child boxes of this box.
      java.util.List<Box> Box.getDescendantBoxes()
      Gets all the descendant boxes (children, their children, and so on) of this box.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
